Scheduled tasks are like setting an alarm clock for your computer. 'Every day at 3pm, do THIS.' We make sure bad guys haven't set secret alarms that tell the computer to do bad things!

In this lesson, we'll learn about windows scheduled tasks security in a way that makes sense. We'll start simple, use real examples, and build your understanding step by step. By the end, you'll understand the core ideas and why they matter!
